summary: Completed frontend UI testing for BowWowMeow Pet Care Application UI improvements. All 6 requested features verified and working correctly.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Schedule button visible in client details dialog header - PASSED
TEST 2: Tabs stack vertically on mobile viewport (375px) - PASSED (grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-3 working)
TEST 3: Walk services show 'Assign Walker' dropdown - PASSED
TEST 4: Day Care services do NOT show walker/sitter dropdown - PASSED
TEST 5: Overnight services show 'Assign Sitter (Optional)' dropdown - PASSED
TEST 6: Day Care appointments can be created from Calendar page - PASSED

test_1_schedule_button.description: Schedule button with data-testid='schedule-btn' is visible in client details dialog header alongside Pricing, Generate Appointments, Force Create, and Edit buttons

test_2_mobile_tabs.description: Tabs (Info, Pets, Schedule) stack vertically on mobile viewport (375px width). Desktop shows horizontal tabs, mobile shows vertical stacked tabs using grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-3

test_3_walk_walker_dropdown.description: When selecting Walk services (30-Minute Walk, 45-Minute Walk, 60-Minute Walk), the 'Assign Walker' dropdown is visible

test_4_daycare_no_dropdown.description: When selecting Day Care service (Doggy Day Care), neither Walker nor Sitter dropdown is shown. Only Date and Number of Days fields appear

test_5_overnight_sitter_dropdown.description: When selecting Overnight services (Overnight at Your Location, Pet Sitting - Our Location), the 'Assign Sitter (Optional)' dropdown is visible instead of Walker dropdown

test_6_daycare_creation.description: Day Care appointment created successfully from Calendar page. Success toast 'Appointment created successfully' displayed

critical_code_review_comments: isWalkService() and isOvernightService() helper functions correctly implemented in CalendarPage.js (lines 70-80)
Walker dropdown conditionally rendered only for walk services (lines 872-893)
Sitter dropdown conditionally rendered only for overnight services (lines 895-916)
Responsive tabs using grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-3 in AdminClientsPage.js (line 1878)
Schedule button properly placed in client details header with flex-wrap (lines 1756-1786)
seed_data_creation: Created 1 Day Care appointment for Demo Client during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI improvements verified working. Schedule button in client details, responsive tabs, and conditional walker/sitter dropdowns based on service type all functioning correctly. Day Care appointments can be created from Calendar page without issues.
